Title: Simulate an ONVIF camera with RTSP
Summary: The following Jumpstart Drop will simulate an OVNIF camera and serve an RTSP feed with an MP4 file.
Description: This project consists of tools and instructions for mocking an ONVIF-compliant IP camera and passing an RTSP stream to simulate a live video stream. The project already provides a way to run it as a Docker container, or build it locally.
